resources.string: You can unlock the app with your face, fingerprint or iris within 30 minutes of signing in with GOV.UK One Login.
If you do not want to use your biometrics, you can unlock the app with your phone’s pin or pattern instead.
Anyone who can unlock your phone with their biometrics or with your phone’s pin or pattern might be able to access your app.
You need to update your phone’s settings
You can only add documents to your GOV.UK Wallet if your phone is protected with a pin or pattern.
This is to make sure no one else can view or add documents to your wallet.
Go to Security and Privacy in your phone’s settings.
Find the option to set up a pin or pattern to unlock your phone - this is usually under Device unlock or Lock screen.
Come back to continue using your GOV.UK Wallet
If you need help, contact the GOV.UK One Login team
